title: Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro AL Offers Lodging for Best Robotics Competition
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro AL Offers Lodging for Best Robotics Competition Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro, AL offers comfortable lodging for Northeast Alabama Best Robotics Competition on November 5-7, 2015. We are pleased to welcome students, teachers, and parents attending the Best Robotics Competition. SCOTTSBORO, AL, October 23,   The Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro Alabama hotel offers comfortable lodging for the Northeast Alabama Best Robotics Competition on November 5-7. The event will be held at the Northeast Alabama Agri-Business Center in nearby Rainsville, Alabama. Middle and high school students will apply their math, science, technology, and engineering skills in games and other challenges. The annual competition is hosted by Northeast Alabama Community College. "We are pleased to welcome students, teachers, and parents attending the Best Robotics Competition," shares Debra Luke, General Manager of the Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro. "Our award winning property is a top hotel choice in Scottsboro. We are just a few minutes' drive from the Northeast Alabama Agri-Business Center," explains Ms. Luke. The Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro features 81 non-smoking standard rooms and king suites with microwave, mini refrigerator, and free high speed Internet. Guests will rest comfortably on Clean and Fresh Hampton Beds . Whirlpool tubs and sofa sleepers are available in some rooms. Hotel amenities include a business center, fitness room, and Pavilion Pantry Market for snacks. Hampton's delicious On the House Breakfast is complimentary. On weekday mornings, On the Run Breakfast Bags are a quick option for guests with limited time. This hotel near downtown Scottsboro has boat trailer parking and charging stations for fishermen heading to nearby Lake Guntersville. The Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro received the 2015 Lighthouse Award and the TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence for outstanding service. HHonors members can earn double points with the 2X Points Package. Other lodging specials include the Weekend Getaway Package and the Shop and Drop Package, with discounts from Unclaimed Baggage Center. AAA and senior rates are available. For information about the Best Robotics Competition, visit www.northeastalabamabest.org . To book your stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro AL hotel , call (256)259-5200 or visit online at www.ScottsboroAlabamaHotel.com .About Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro Alabama Hotel The Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro hotel in Alabama is located in the mountain/lakes region of northern Alabama surrounded by majestic mountains and rich valleys, located minutes from Lake Guntersville. Whether in town for business or pleasure, Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro has been designed with your comfort in mind, from boat parking to complimentary high-speed Internet access; your comfort is their main goal. Each of the hotel's spacious rooms and suites features the Clean & Fresh Hampton bed, mini refrigerator, microwave, work desk, basic cable plus HBO, and 37 inch flat panel TV. For more information visit: http://www.ScottsboroAlabamaHotel.com For all media inquiries, please contact: Allison Reinert
